reviewText: Older set of movies are included but it has Joseph Smith: The prophet of the restoration dvd and thats mainly why I bought it. But its a great set. Also it includes some animated movie slides about the doctrine and covenants. I watched some with younger siblings and its cool; good stuff for primary.
I bought some of these to use as gifts and for the Missionaries to hand out to new converts and have never been disappointed with the series.
I use the DVD's in my lessons. They have a lot of great presentations. I especially like the movies that were in the last DVD.
Hard to beat for the money.  Have not seen all but what I have is Excellent. It is well worth the purchase.
